legal.title: Legal
legal.body: Please review the IOTA wallet Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

legal.checkbox: I’ve read and I accept the Privacy policy & ToS

settings.title: Language & appearance
settings.body: Choose your wallet’s language and theme

password.title: Create a password for your wallet
password.body: Your password needs to be highly secure to encrypt and recover your Stronghold vault. Also, you will need this to send tokens from your wallet.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body_1: Set up your login PIN or Touch ID to ensure that only you can access the app.

pin.title: Set up PIN code
pin.body_1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for this frequently when you access your device.

confirm_pin.title: Confirm the PIN code you created
confirm_pin.body: Confirm the PIN code you created

backup.title: Back up your wallet
backup.body_1: You will be shown a secret phrase. You will need these to restore your wallet and funds.
backup.body_2: Do not share this phrase with anyone. Your secret phrase can access your funds at any time from anywhere.
backup.body_3: If you lose this, you lose your funds.

recovery_phrase.title: Recovery phrase
recovery_phrase.body_1: Carefully copy the words in the exact order below. You can create a secondary backup on iCloud.
recovery_phrase.body_2: Keep this private and safely stored

verify_recovery_phrase.title: Verify recovery phrase
verify_recovery_phrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Click the words on the right in the exact order you have written them down.

backup_recovery_phrase.title: Back up to a file
backup_recovery_phrase.body: You wallet password is also used to encrypt a Stronghold backup. Enter your wallet password to save your recovery phrase backup to a file.

congratulations.title: Congratulations
congratulations.body: Your new wallet is ready to use.

import.title: Import a wallet
import.body: If you have an existing seed or wallet back up, you can import it here.

import_from_text.title: Type your seed or secret phrase
import_from_text.body_1: A seed consists of 81 characters. This is used to recover the older Trinity wallet.
import_from_text.body_2: A secret phrase is a 24 word mnemonic. This is used to recover a newer FireFly wallet.
import_from_text.body_3: Enter your seed or secret phrase

import_from_file.title: Restore your wallet using a backup file
import_from_file.body: Upload a file to restore existing wallet funds. File backups can be either a Trinity SeedVault or a Firefly Stronghold.

import_backup_password.title: Restore your wallet using a backup file
import_backup_password.body_2: This is the password created when you first created your backup. This stops unauthorised access to your funds.

import_success.title_1: You have successfully recovered your backup
import_success.body_1: Your secret phrase is correct, you can now set up your new wallet
import_success.title_2: You have successfully recovered your backup
import_success.body_2: Your password is correct, you can now continue

migrate.title: Transfer your funds
migrate.body_1: This is an automated process to transfer your existing funds to your new wallet. In this process we will check for spent addresses that weaken your security.
migrate.body_2: It may take some time. Do not turn off your device during this process.

migrate_failed.title: Transfer your funds
migrate_failed.body: Provide your wallet and Stronghold password. This is the password created when you first created your original wallet backup. This allows secure import of your recovery phrase.

general.scan_qr_or_paste: Scan a QR code or paste an Address
general.enter_seed_or_phrase: Enter an IOTA seed or secret phrase
general.upload_seedvault_or_stronghold: Upload a Seedvault or Stronghold file
